turn.0: Hi, I'm your automated assistant. I can answer your questions about Magpul Industries.
turn.2: Magpul Industries Magpul Industries Corporation is an American designer and manufacturer of high-tech polymer and composite firearms accessories.
turn.4: The corporate headquarters is in Austin, Texas in the United States.
turn.5: What is one of their main products?
turn.6: Magpul Industries takes its name from its first product, the MagPul (which stands for "magazine puller"), an accessory for the STANAG magazines used by US and NATO armed forces, which aided users in pulling the magazine out of its pouch.
turn.7: Are there any other interesting aspects about this article?
turn.8: Originally based in Colorado, Magpul announced its intention to leave the state in 2013 when new gun control laws caused many of its products to become illegal in the state; it has relocated its factories to Wyoming and its offices to Texas.
turn.10: Magpul Industries Corp was founded in 1999 by Richard M. Fitzpatrick, a sergeant in the United States Marine Corps Force Reconnaissance.
turn.11: What other products do they sell?
turn.12: The company currently has two divisions: Magpul Industries, which manufactures firearms accessories etc.; and Magpul Core (formerly Magpul Dynamics), founded in 2008, which delivers firearms training, including instructional videos.
